content:
Hello Everyone,

Our course website is https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/6.100L_fa22 

You will be able to log onto the site using your Kerberos. On 9/7 everyone that registered for the class and has access to the canvas site has a student account.

  • After 9/7 if you are getting the following message:
    "You are logged in but have not been added as a student yet."
    please comment your Kerberos below and we will give you a student account. Make sure that you're registered (or will register) for the class.
  • If you're getting an "Application Blocked" message please make sure that you are using https not http in the url.
  • If you get a 502 Bad Gateway error try the following. Access the site from incognito and if that works clear your cache and try accessing the site normally. If you're still having problems please post below.

    #pin
subject: Course Website
